title: Boiled collar of bacon with vegetables and dumplings
ingredients: 1.4kg/3lb 1oz collar of bacon, skin on, soaked in cold water overnight in the fridge or in a cool place
8 small shallots, peeled but with root end intact
4 medium carrots, sliced on the diagonal to 5mm/¼in thick
3 sticks celery, sliced on the diagonal to 5mm/¼in thick
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
